<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kobold Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2381) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've trained with weapons ideal for subterranean efficiency. You are trained with the [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), [greatpick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=23), [light pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=30), [pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34), and [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10). You also gain access to all uncommon [kobold](/Traits.aspx?ID=224) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial kobold weapons are simple weapons, and advanced kobold weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Kobold Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Kobold Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2390), [Kobold Weapon Innovator](/Feats.aspx?ID=2383)
name: Kobold Weapon Familiarity
